column5: This fully equipped Private Hill country paradise is the perfect romantic getaway. Soak up the sun on the 2 person lounge bed surrounded by tropical palms & 40' diving pool. Relax in your private outdoor Jacuzzi and stargaze right off the porch of your cozy cabin. medina lake is also close by and the hosts can help arrange a boating trip. Early check in and late check out are available for a fee.
column8: Hill Country Luxury Resort Cabin with hot tub
